description:
Hello fellow game designers, artists, students and coders! This Udemy course is based on teaching you how to make amazing games extremely fast. I've been making video games for a while now and nothing comes close to the speed of construct 2. You will also be learning how to monetize your game instantly seeing a profit from your masterpiece.

This course is targeted towards people who would rather not code. Students, Artists, and Designers.

This course is jam packed with everything you need to know to start making your own video games. Its 3 and a half hours and shouldn't take you long to complete. 1 day tops.

"How To Make Mobile And HTML 5 Games In Construct 2" is structured in 8 major chapters. Each chapter covers just about every nook and cranny of C2.

If your someone who wants to make money from developing games this course is for you.
title: How To Create HTML5 And Mobile Games Using Construct 2
